summary: This episode follows the rise to prominence of the University Of Miami after years of indifferent results. New coach Howard Schnellenberger revitalized the program by introducing fresh blood and fresh attitude into the team.
cast: Billy Corben|John Green|Luther Campbell|Tolbert Bain|Bennie Blades|Howard Schnellenberger|Sam Jankovich|Bernie Kosar|Art Kehoe|Don Bailey Jr.|Willis McGahee|Duane Starks|Santana Moss|Brett Perriman|Jerry Rushin|Melvin Bratton|James T.|Kevin Brinkworth|Robert Bailey|Drew Rosenhaus|Jeremy Shockey|Steve Walsh|Alonzo Highsmith|Michael Irvin|Carlos Huerta|Jimmy Johnson|Dan Le Batard|Leon Searcy|Randal Hill|Kelvin Harris|Jonathan Vilma|Mario Cristobal|Lamar Thomas|K.C. Jones|Don Soldinger|Jerome Brown|Bob Rubin|Ryan McNeil|Dennis Erickson|John Routh|Butch Davis|Bernard Clark|Shane Curry|Craig Erickson|Tad Foote|Mike Francesa|Tom Hammond|Pat Jacobs|Andrea Joyce|George Mira Jr.|Dwayne Johnson
title: The U
